name: NFT Wars
description:
You have recently discovered NFTs, or Non-Fungible Tokens: basically, they're pictures you can draw and sell for thousands of dollars. Your task is to earn as much money as possible through NFTs. Buy colors, brushes, and machines to aid you in your quest. Good luck!

INSTRUCTIONS (Please read them, they're all necessary):

Arrow keys/WASD to move around

Space to interact with objects:

  • Interact with your laptop to draw NFTs by hand (Left/right to cycle through colors, up/down to cycle through brushes, space to sell your NFT)
  • Interact with the paint bucket to buy colors
  • Interact with the brush palette to buy brushes
  • Interact with the metal pedestal to buy machines:
    • Machines can draw one brush stroke on an NFT. Interact with a machine to train it by drawing one stroke.
    • Interact with the outlets on the either side of a machine to connect it to another one. Left outlets accept NFTs from other machines, and right outlets send NFTs to other machines. Hook up the right outlet of one machine to the left outlet of another.
  • Interact with the door to... well, you'll have to see for yourself.
